summary: All-in-One Utility Platform: Phase 1 - Advanced Calculator Hub, Phase 2 - PDF Tools Module, Phase 3 - Advanced Image Tools Module with passport/government document photo makers, image compression, format conversion, background removal, and DPI adjustment, Phase 4 - SEO & Monetization Foundation with global SEO structure, AdSense-ready layout, performance optimization, and internal linking, Phase 5 - Advanced Resume Builder with Indian and International format templates. Phase 6 - Global Multi-Language System with 9 languages, language switcher in header, i18n structure, language-based URLs, hreflang tags, canonical tags, and lazy-loaded language files. Phase 7 - Performance & UI Optimization with code splitting, lazy loading, UI refinement, AdSense optimization layout, improved internal linking, and enhanced SEO structure. Phase 9 - Smart Document Fixer Upgrade with side-by-side Before/After preview, zoom/toggle/crop/rotate preview, Auto Photo Size Generator with government presets, auto features, and export options — all client-side only. Phase 9 Pro UI: Smart Document Fixer now has a freemium model (Free: 2 fixes/day, standard quality, watermark; Pro: unlimited, HD, A4 sheet, no watermark, multi-photo sheet) with Go Pro button, pricing modal (₹499/month, ₹3999/year), feature comparison table, PRO badge on card, lock icons and blur on premium features for free users — all simulated via localStorage, no login/backend/payment gateway. All other tools remain 100% free and unchanged. Phase 10 - Advanced User-Controlled Mode for all non-calculator tools: Image Tools, PDF Tools, Converters, and Compressors upgraded with manual settings selection before processing, unit selection (px/cm/inches/mm/KB/MB), quality/size controls, preview before download, format selection, before/after comparison, and download enabled only after preview. Homepage updated to show all FREE tools on front page with clear icons per tool card, Pro tools in a separate labeled section — existing layout/design/theme unchanged. Calculators remain 100% untouched.

Create an AutoFeaturesPanel component at frontend/src/components/image-tools/AutoFeaturesPanel.tsx that applies automatic image enhancements to an uploaded image entirely client-side using HTML5 Canvas. The panel must expose four toggleable features, each applied via canvas pixel manipulation or 2D context drawing: (1) Auto White Background — detect non-white areas and fill surrounding transparent or near-white pixels with solid white (#FFFFFF) using flood-fill or alpha-compositing; (2) Auto Center Crop Guide — overlay a visual center-crop grid guide on the preview (does not alter the output pixels, only the preview overlay); (3) Auto Compress to Selected KB — use the existing compressImageToTargetSize utility to iteratively reduce quality until the file is at or below the user-selected KB value (presets: 20 KB, 50 KB, 100 KB, 200 KB, or custom input); (4) Multi-Copy Layout — arrange 4 copies of the processed photo on a single canvas in a 2×2 grid with 5 px gutters, sized to fit on A4 dimensions (2480×3508 px at 300 DPI). All four features must be independently toggleable via checkboxes and applied in sequence when the user clicks 'Apply & Preview'.

All downloads must use secure Blob URLs (URL.createObjectURL) and revoke them after download. No server calls permitted.
